scripts.build: cd packages/denim-platform-admin && yarn build && cd ../denim-platform-web && yarn build
scripts.transpile: cd packages/denim && npx tsc && cd ../denim-forms && npx tsc && cd ../denim-express && npx tsc && cd ../denim-airtable && npx tsc
scripts.transpile:watch: (cd packages/denim && npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput) & (cd packages/denim-forms && npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput) & (cd packages/denim-express && npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput) & (cd packages/denim-airtable && npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput)
